name: Hue-Man: Chaos Edition
description:
MOST ANTICIPATED GAME OF 2017

                   

   The Game

Oh no! The hue-tiful blobs are attacking! Survive as long as possible before you're OVERLOADED by the mob.

Destroy a blob by shooting it with the same colored bullet. Be careful though... shooting them with the wrong color only makes them TWICE as mad! So first, make sure to scan in the right color with your laser beam.

Extra CHAOS: Good luck with Slime Wheel's special bonuses...

   Controls
  • WASD moves your character 
  • Mouse aims bullets and laser
  • Right-click to scan enemy color. Your bullets are now that color!
  • Left-click shoot enemy (remember to shoot with the right color)
  • Press spacebar to start and replay the game
   Slime Wheel

When the Slime Wheel spins, more chaos will enter the game! Possible mods are:

  1. You, the blobs, or your bullets will shrink/grow
  2. Bullets become penetrating
  3. You get another drone
  4. Drones each get their own color shot
  5. When an enemy dies, all nearby enemies change colors
NOTE: We uploaded a fix for the leaderboards. The game is still functionally the same. The original html submission is attached.

                   

Made in a weekend for MiniJam#100.
